Function Documentation

template<typename Printable , typename Stream >
void cusp::print ( const Printable &  p,
Stream &  s 
) [inline]

print : print a textual representation of an object on a given stream

Parameters:
p matrix, array, or other printable object
s stream on which to write the output
Template Parameters:
Printable printable type
Stream output stream type

The following code snippet demonstrates how to use print.

  #include <cusp/array2d.h>
  #include <cusp/print.h>

  #include <sstream>
  
  int main(void)
  {
      // initialize a 2x3 matrix
      cusp::array2d<float, cusp::host_memory> A(2,3);
      A(0,0) = 10;  A(0,1) = 20;  A(0,2) = 30;
      A(1,0) = 40;  A(1,1) = 50;  A(1,2) = 60;
  
      std::ostringstream oss;

      // print A to stream
      cusp::print(A, oss);
  
      return 0;
  }
template<typename Printable >
void cusp::print ( const Printable &  p  )  [inline]

print : print a textual representation of an object

Parameters:
p matrix, array, or other printable object
Template Parameters:
Printable printable type

The following code snippet demonstrates how to use print.

  #include <cusp/array2d.h>
  #include <cusp/print.h>
  
  int main(void)
  {
      // initialize a 2x3 matrix
      cusp::array2d<float, cusp::host_memory> A(2,3);
      A(0,0) = 10;  A(0,1) = 20;  A(0,2) = 30;
      A(1,0) = 40;  A(1,1) = 50;  A(1,2) = 60;
  
      // print A
      cusp::print(A);
  
      return 0;
  }
